leg swings.name: Leg Swings
instructions: Stand sideways next to a wall or support for balance
Keep your standing leg slightly bent
Swing your other leg forward and backward
Keep your core engaged and maintain good posture
tips: Start with smaller swings and gradually increase range of motion
Keep your upper body stable throughout the movement
Don't force the swings - stay within a comfortable range

push-ups.name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Lower your body by bending your elbows
Keep your core tight and body in a straight line
Push back up to the starting position
Repeat for desired number of repetitions
tips: Keep your elbows at a 45-degree angle to your body
Look at a spot on the ground about a foot in front of you
Don't let your hips sag or pike up
Modify on knees if needed for proper form
